item.title: Mrandom
item.description: A Pythonic Random Module for JavaScripters and TypeScripters A while back (8 months ago apparently…) I got fed up with the built-in Math.random() function in JavaScript/in the Browser. It’s not that it’s bad per se, but it’s not very flexible and pretty opaque. For example, it’s not even possible to set the seed for the random number generator. Oh, and if you want an integer between 0 and n, you have to do something like Math.
